form.official-title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the need to create a small donor and public finance system for Congressional elections.

section.header: Providing for small donor and public financing of elections
section.text: It is the sense of the House of Representatives that, in order to eliminate the undue influence of money in politicsâ€”

paragraph.text: Congress should create a small donor and public finance system for Congressional elections, which will ensure that Congress is responsible to voters instead of well-financed special interests; and
Members of Congress should devote their full time to regular order and governing instead of campaign fundraising.
